phrases: Has not Shen Long granted the wish yet?
We are counting on you, Shen Long!
Once those who were killed by Freeza and his ring are resurrected,
the Grand Elder should return to life, and Planet Namek's Shen Long should appear.
This is the only means by which Goku and the others can be saved now.
In three minutes, this planet will undergo a giant explosion!
There was no way someone like you could have beaten Freeza!
There is nothing else we can do!
You realize that, do not you Gohan-kun?
If we do not escape from here right now...
take Piccolo-san and return to Earth ahead of us.
Freeza intends to wipe out all Saiyans.
That means if I return to Earth, then Freeza will go to Earth next!
You are not, by any chance...
I am my father's-Son Goku's son!
And now I... I will take on Freeza!
There is no way you can win!
I am sure Piccolo-san would say the same thing.
Chichi-san, our Goku cannot possibly be beaten!
He is must surely be winning against Freeza!
He is right, he is right!
On the other hand, do not matter how bad Goku may be thrashin' on what is-his-mug,
once the whole planet blows up, he are not...
I will thank you not to be sayin' such ill-fated things!
My Goku-sa will not be dyin' so easily!
I am sure he is comin' home in good shape!
I am sure... I am sure he is comin' home!
What is the meaning of this?
There is something strange about this!
What is with the ground shaking?
Not to mention the sky being dark.
What in the world is going on?
Is this an indication that the planet is just about to explode?
It looks as though it would be best for me to get away from this planet.
If I get caught in the blast, I will lose even more power sharply.
Now, you will have to face me!
To think you still had the power to fly so fast.
Just what you would expect of a Saiyan brat!
I am going to defeat you!
You are going to defeat me, you say?
Are you thinking of fighting me, Freeza, in your exhausted condition?
You for one are aware of my overwhelming power, are not you?
You are so miserable, you Saiyans.
Even when outclassed, you still cannot keep yourselves from fighting.
This saves me the trouble of going to Earth.
So then, last of the Saiyans, come at me!
What do you think you are doing?
Were not you going to defeat me?
Or is it that before my overwhelming power, the only thing you could do was run?
Now then, what manner of death do you desire?
If I can detain Freeza for two minutes, he will be gone, together with the planet...
Whosoever was killed by Freeza and his ring on Planet Namek have been returned to life.
Everyone has been restored to life!
What about the all-important Grand Elder?
How is Planet Namek's Super Shen Long?
That is proof that Super Shen Long and the Grand Elder are back alive.
Why... why am I in the mortal world?
It is just as I figured!
You have hurry and to tell him your intentions, or he will...!
The Grand Elder's measure of life will once again...!
I am the Kaio over the Northern Galaxy.
I want you to listen closely to what I am about to say.
Just a little bit more time...
Where did all that spirit you had a moment ago go?
I just thought of something nice!
I think I will put you into the same grave as your father.
You should be grateful for my kindness.
Okay, that put a little bit more fight into him.
I have figured out what you were after!
You are stalling for time, are not you?
You have realized that this planet only has a few more moments of its life span left, have not you?
You, who killed Father and Kuririn-san...
I cannot allow someone like you to go on living!
It has to be like this, or it would not be enjoyable.
However, I am done playing around.
You have gone to such trouble, so let me show you...
I thought I told you to get away!
Goku rises again from the brink of death!
Can Kaio's wish reach the Super Shen Long Polunga before the destruction of Planet Namek?
